prompt.preamble:
We are testing a system for understanding people's interest in reading different kinds of online articles.
For example, you might be interested in articles about some topics, but not about others.
prompt.task_description: your preferences of what kinds of online articles you would like to read
prompt.final: In the final part of the study, you will give feedback on a test set of article headline and descriptions, which will enable us to see how well a chatbot reading your responses has learned what you like and dislike.
prompt.evaluation: Please indicate whether you would like to read the following articles: "yes" if you would, "no" if you would not.

conversation_history.message:
Are you interested in the following article? Website Name: HistoricalDigest
Title: The Impacts of Climate Change on Ancient Civilizations: An Archaeological Perspective
Description: Unearth the complex relationship between climate change and the rise and fall of ancient civilizations in this enlightening article, drawing on the latest archaeological research and climatological data.
Yes, I would be interested in learning more about this article on climate change and ancient civilizations.

Are you interested in the following article? Website Name: FoodWorldExplorer
Title: The Art of Sushi: A Deep Dive into the Creation and Customs of Japan's Culinary Gem
Description: Journey through Japan’s rich culinary heritage as we explore the intricate craftsmanship behind sushi-making. Learn about its history, customs, and the etiquette of enjoying this traditional dish.
I would not be interested in reading this article because I do not have any interest in sushi.

Are you interested in the following article? Website Name: InterstellarTravelLogs
Title: The Practicality of Interstellar Travel: From Physics to Philosophy 
Description: Dive deep into the scientific, ethical, and philosophical dimensions of interstellar travel. This article evaluates the feasibility of reaching the stars from perspectives of theoretical physics and investigates the potential philosophical implications of humanity becoming a multi-star species.
I would not be interested in learning more about this article.

Are you interested in the following article? Website Name: LifestyleAndWellnessHub
Title: Harnessing Mindfulness: A Comprehensive Guide to Meditation and its Benefits to Physical and Mental Health 
Description: This article delves into the world of mindfulness and meditation, exploring their origins, different techniques, and their proven impacts on physical and mental health. Incorporate mindfulness practices into your everyday life and discover a new source of tranquility amidst the chaos of modern living.
I would be interested in the following article because I care about mental health.

Are you interested in the following article? Website Name: FutureTechInsights
Title: Biohacking: Transhumanism and the Quest for Immortality
Description: Delve into the controversial world of biohacking, where the human body is the new frontier for technological advancement. This article explores the ethical implications and potential consequences of meddling with our own biology for the sake of progress and immortality. Uncover the risks, rewards, and philosophical debate surrounding transhumanism.
I would not be interested in this article.

query_prompt.content:
Your task is to learn what topics a user is interested in reading online article about. People's interests are broad, so you should seek to understand their interests across many topics; in other words, go for breadth rather than depth. Do not assume a user has given a complete answer to any question, so make sure to keep probing different types of interests.

Come up with a potential edge case to learn as much information as you can about what their desired behavior should be under different circumstances.
Make sure the edge case addresses different aspects of the system than the edge cases that have already been considered.

An example edge case is: Are you interested in the following article? Website Name: TechTalkDaily
Title: 10 Must-Have Gadgets for 2023: A Comprehensive Guide
Description: Discover the top 10 gadgets that will revolutionize your daily life in 2023. From smart home devices to the latest wearables, we've got you covered with our comprehensive guide.

Current cases:
- [Q] -> [A]

Generate the most informative edge case that, when answered, will reveal the most about the desired behavior beyond what has already been queried for above. Generate the edge case in the following format, and nothing else: "Are you interested in the following article? [edge case]"
